definition: جذل jadala a (jadal) to be happy, gay, exuberant, rejoice IV to make happy, gladden, cheer (ه s.o.) جذل jidl pl. اجذال ajdāl, جذول judūl stump (of a tree) جذل jada1 gaiety, hilarity, exuberance, happiness 116 جذل jadil pl. جذلان judlān gay, hilarious, cheerful, in high spirits, exuberant, happy
